pr_title: Enable setting up snakeyaml max alias via ENV var

timeline.author: nictas

timeline.message:
Enable setting up snakeyaml max alias via ENV var

Adopt multiapps 1.93.0. Enable configuring max alias for collections for
snakeyaml parser via environment variable. JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-843
